installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Mohist Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt install -y curl

#Go into main direction
if [ ! -d /mnt/server ]; then
    mkdir /mnt/server
fi

cd /mnt/server

if [ ! -z ${BUILD_VERSION} ]; then
    DOWNLOAD_LINK=https://mohistmc.com/api/${MC_VERSION}/${BUILD_VERSION}/download
else
    DOWNLOAD_LINK=https://mohistmc.com/api/${MC_VERSION}/${BUILD_TYPE}/download
fi

#Downloading jars
echo -e "Download link is ${DOWNLOAD_LINK}"
echo -e "Downloading build version ${BUILD_VERSION}"
if [ ! -z "${DOWNLOAD_LINK}" ]; then 
    if curl --output /dev/null --silent --fail ${DOWNLOAD_LINK}; then
        echo -e "Download link is valid."
    else
        echo -e "Link is invalid closing out"
        exit 2
    fi
fi

curl -s -o server.jar -sS ${DOWNLOAD_LINK}

#Checking if downloaded jars exist
if [ ! -f ./server.jar ]; then
    echo "!!! Error downloading build version ${BUILD_VERSION} !!!"
    exit
fi
